vulnerability_location.description: Unsafe arithmetic operations without overflow checks: expanding the array length with `transfers.length + data.length`, accumulating values in `acc += amount`, and updating `totalToDistribute += acc` can all overflow in Solidity <0.8.0.
Low-level call using _dst.call.value(_value)(_data) without checking the return value
External calls to token.transfer inside the loop can fail and trigger throw, reverting the transaction and preventing any further token distributions (denial of service)
Floating pragma '^0.4.11' allows compilation with different compiler versions, leading to inconsistent behavior.
